TELL YOUR STORY
Browse our collections, which feature jewellery pieces that will take your style game to the next level. Stand-out looks are made easy with colours you decide. Don’t stress it – just change the colours to spell out your vibe.

From bracelets to pendants, studs to ear chains… boring jewellery is over, and we’re calling it. Explore our collections and discover jewellery that lets you express yourself with colours that mean something, whether that’s sharing your identity, or what you’re into. Your choice.

settings.text_row_1:
At BAEKKE, we believe in the power of self-expression. Created in 2017 by Lene Schødt, a Danish female founder with a passion for design and a commitment to making a difference, our brand is a celebration of individuality with some lowkey conscious living thrown in for good measure.

MEET OUR FOUNDER Lene Schødt, the driving force behind BAEKKE, is an inspiring woman who’s borderline obsessed with jewellery that anyone can wear, however they like. With a background in design, Lene mixes up her expertise with a desire for positive change.
settings.text_row_2:
Lene believes in the potential for small actions to make a big impact – that’s why BAEKKE's Small Streams initiative was born. Through the initiative, each bead purchase triggers donations to various organisations, contributing to positive change, one bead at a time.

Lene is all about a cradle-to-cradle approach in her design process. This means every piece can be easily disassembled and recycled, so resources are kept in circulation as long as possible. Lene's passion for circular design fuels BAEKKE's mission to create jewellery that not only looks good but does good too.

settings.text: We're here to listen to what you have to say. Reach out to us with any enquiries, feedback, or even just to share your BAEKKE story. We value your thoughts and love connecting with our BAEKKE community, online and IRL.

settings.title: WHO WE ARE
settings.heading:
Meet
our
founder
settings.text:
WHO WE ARE

At BAEKKE, we believe in the power of self-expression. Created in 2017 by Lene Schødt, a Danish female founder with a passion for design and a commitment to making a difference, our brand is a celebration of individuality with some lowkey conscious living thrown in for good measure.

Lene Schødt, the driving force behind BAEKKE, is an inspiring woman who’s borderline obsessed with jewellery that anyone can wear, however they like. With a background in design, Lene mixes up her expertise with a desire for positive change.

WHAT INSPIRES US

Lene’s journey began with a vision to reinvent ‘normal’ jewellery and make it more versatile, adaptable and sustainable. Inspired by the concept of change, Her approach led to the creation of BAEKKE's interchangeable bead system, which lets wearers customise jewellery to match any outfit or mood.

Lene and the team are all about a cradle-to-cradle approach in the design process. This means every piece can be easily disassembled and recycled, so resources are kept in circulation as long as possible. Lene's passion for circular design fuels BAEKKE's mission to create jewellery that not only looks good but does good too.

settings.title: CONECT WITH US
settings.heading: Contact Us

012 United Kingdom.

settings.title: #DOPAMINEDRESSING
settings.heading: ENTER YOUR COLOUR ERA
settings.text: Meet BAEKKE – where main characters like you show off their true colours. Our jewellery features interchangeable beads, so it fits any outfit, mood or message – no notes. One piece, many looks: it’s jewellery that hits different and gets across what you want to say.

settings.title: JUST OWN IT
settings.text:
Our jewellery is made with durable plastic beads that you simply click on and off so you can change up your look whenever you want. Bracelets, pendants, earrings… create your own look knowing your jewellery is on point and speaks the same language as you.

See our collection here +

settings.title: SHOW YOUR COLOURS
settings.text:
A different vibe every day? We love this for you. Time to add some colour coding to your outfit rotation with beads produced in Denmark and jewellery made of brass, silver and gold-plated brass with 18K red gold.

Read more about BAEKKE here +

settings.title: TAKE A CHANCE
settings.text:
Our next-level jewellery means endless looks from just one piece. So you can do you, with colours that are your choice, nobody else’s, and can mean something… or not. That’s up to you. With BAEKKE, you’re kitted out for all kinds of moods and plans – ready to bring the realness to your outfit.

Visit our blog here +

settings.title: TELL A NEW STORY
settings.text:
BAEKKE jewellery is designed with a cradle-to-cradle approach, so you can feel good about what you bought, knowing that it can be easily recycled or reused when its life is over. Jewellery just got an update and we’re here for it.

Read about our design and sustainability here +

settings.title: FEEL THE FREEDOM
settings.text:
Female-founded, purpose-led and serving absolute realness, BAEKKE brings jewellery that you can use to tell your own story, every day. Shop our collection now and never stop changing…

Meet our founder here +

settings.question: Q: How do Baekke's interchangeable beads work?
settings.answer: A: Baekke's interchangeable beads feature a unique click-on and click-off mechanism. Simply slide the bead onto your bracelet, pendant, or earrings and give it a gentle click to secure it in place. To change beads, just click them off and replace them with the colours that suit your vibe that day, or use them to share a coded message. It’s up to you.

settings.question: Q: Can I mix and match beads from different collections?
settings.answer: A: Absolutely – Baekke's interchangeable bead system allows you to mix and match beads from different collections. Get creative and customise your jewellery however you want.

settings.question: Q: How durable are Baekke's jewellery pieces?
settings.answer: A: Our beads are made of durable plastic (polyethylene, which is highly recyclable), which ensures that they can be clicked on and off the bracelet again and again. However, we recommend that you do not leave the beads on the jewellery when you’re not wearing it – to prevent the plastic from “tiring”.

settings.question: Q: Can I purchase additional beads separately?
settings.answer: A: You certainly can. Baekke offers a wide range of individual beads that you can purchase separately, so you can expand your collection and create even more looks.

settings.question: Q: Are Baekke's materials sustainable?
settings.answer: A: Sustainability is at the core of our design philosophy: we carefully select materials with a focus on recyclability and longevity. Our jewellery is thoughtfully made to minimise waste and maximise its lifecycle.

settings.question: Q: How can I care for my Baekke jewellery?
settings.answer: A: To keep your Baekke jewellery looking its best, we recommend gently cleaning it with a soft cloth. Avoid exposing it to harsh chemicals or excessive moisture. Storing your jewellery in a cool, dry place when not in use will help maintain its quality.

settings.question: Q: Does Baekke offer international shipping?
settings.answer: A: Yes, we offer international shipping to customers worldwide. No matter where you are, you can enjoy our unique jewellery and keep changing your looks to suit your mood.

settings.text:
Find the answer

Got questions? We've got answers. Find all the information you need in our frequently asked questions section here. From details about our materials to tips on how to look after your jewellery, we're here to make sure your BAEKKE experience is 100% good vibes only.

settings.title: design and sustainability
settings.heading:
Small streams
make a
great river
settings.text:
SHARE YOUR VIBE

You wanted change and we understood the assignment – which is why behind our statement designs lies a commitment to sustainability. We believe in making a positive impact on the planet without compromising on style.

BAEKKE jewellery is thoughtfully made with recyclable materials, to make sure your choices are part of a brighter future. Read on to discover the details of our design process and how serious we are about keeping resources in circulation.

MAKE IT LAST

We’re conscious of waste. That's why we carefully select and make use of materials that can last for generations to come. Circularity is a vital part of BAEKKE design: making sure what we produce can be easily taken apart and upcycled.

So when the lifetime of one product is complete, it can be transformed into something new with equal or even higher value. In other words, we're totally committed to reducing waste and maximising the potential of every material. You wouldn’t have it any other way, right?

MAKE IT COUNT

What are you saying with your BAEKKE colours? Selected colour designs support local, national, and international organisations. Our Small Streams Initiative lets you be part of something bigger: you can contribute to organisations who want to make a difference..

‘Small Streams’ comes from the proverb “Small streams make a great river”, the inspiration for the name BAEKKE, which means streams or ‘brooks’. Even the smallest acts of kindness can lead to real change. So explore the stories behind our support and feel the buzz of knowing your jewellery does more than just pop.

settings.title: about baekke
settings.heading:
Never
stop
changing
settings.text:
LET’S GET REAL

At BAEKKE, we believe in the power of self-expression. Created in 2017 by Lene Schødt, a Danish female founder with a passion for design and a commitment to making a difference, our brand is a celebration of individuality with some lowkey conscious living thrown in for good measure.

We also believe in the potential for small actions to make a big impact – that’s why BAEKKE's Small Streams initiative was born. Through the initiative, each bead purchase triggers donations to various organisations, contributing to positive change, one bead at a time.

TIME TO TALK PLASTIC

At Baekke, we understand the concern surrounding the use of plastic. But guess what? Turns out plastic isn’t a dirty word: single use plastic is. So while our jewellery is not made from recycled plastic, our innovative design allows you to easily click the beads on and off, promoting long-term use rather than single-use consumption, which is the enemy of the environment.

It’s true: plastic, when responsibly managed, is a valuable resource that can be highly reusable. Unlike materials like glass that require a LOT of energy for recycling (thanks to their high melting temperatures) plastic can be reused with a lot less energy. And of course, being able to detach materials from one another is essential for successful recycling, and we’ve done that through our (excuse us while we flex a moment) ingenious design.

SPEAK YOUR TRUTH

BAEKKE is more than just a jewellery brand. It's a movement that empowers you to embrace your individuality and make positive changes. With Lene leading the way, we invite you to be part of the BAEKKE community and celebrate colour and self-expression through design that cares.

Check out our iconic jewellery, find something that speaks to you… and become part of the BAEKKE journey. Like you, we want to look good, and want to look after this planet too… it’s the only one we’ve got, right?
